contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|rind}} '''Rind''' may refer to: ;Food *[[Peel (fruit)]] *[[Pork rind]] *The outer layer of [[cheese]] *Candied rind; see [[Succade]] *Grated rind; see [[Zest (ingredient)]] ;Places *[[Rind, Armenia]], also ''Rrind'' ;People *[[Rind (Baloch tribe)]], a tribe in Balochistan ;People with the surname *[[Abdost Rind]] (c. 1984 – 2011), Pakistani reporter *[[Bruce Rind]] (born 1953), American psychologist and chess player *[[Mir Chakar Rind]] (1468 – 1565), Baloch chieftain *[[Haqeer Rind]], Sindhi poet and social worker *[[Darya Khan Rind]], Sindhi poet ;Other *[[Rind (giantess)]], a giantess in Norse mythology *[[Rind et al. controversy]], about a study on child sexual abuse by lead author Bruce Rind *RIND - acronym for [[reversible ischemic neurologic deficit]] *[[Weathering rind]] of rocks and boulders, produced by spheroidal weathering *[[Millrind]], a support component for millstones ==See also== *[[Rynd (disambiguation)]] {{disambig}}
